Note that during a leap second there may be more (or less) than 60 seconds in aminute; see the description of leap seconds for details.This message combines position, velocity and time solution, including accuracy figures

column7: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch.See the description of iTOW for details.
GNSSfix Type:0: no fix1: dead reckoning only2: 2D-fix3: 3D-fix4: GNSS + dead reckoning combined5: time only fix
